title: Syed Abu Hurairah meets Balochistan sports leadership, wins praise for achievements
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 19 (APP):International Taekwondo athlete and Metrix Pakistan’s Global Ambassador, Syed Abu Hurairah Shah, called on Provincial Secretary Sports Durra Baloch and Director General Sports Balochistan Yasir Khan Bazai at the Balochistan Secretariat in Quetta.

During the meeting, the provincial sports leadership appreciated Abu Hurairah Shah’s outstanding achievements, dedication, and passion for martial arts. They assured full support for promoting youth talent and martial arts development across the province.

Speaking to APP, Syed Abu Hurairah Shah expressed his gratitude to the provincial sports authorities for their encouragement. He said such recognition motivates athletes to work harder and raise Pakistan’s flag high in international competitions.

The meeting highlighted the importance of investing in young athletes and martial arts, with officials noting that sports play a vital role in channelizing youth energies positively. The collaboration is expected to further strengthen opportunities for emerging talent in Balochistan.
